src:
VIDEO: Srhljivo: ko na posnetku gledaš zamaskiranca, kako vlamlja v tvojo hišo
»Kljub maski na obrazu te bom dobil in ti bo precej bolj neprijetno, kot je zdaj meni.«
02 Nov 2019, 09:59 by A. L.
PTUJ – Po družabnih omrežjih kroži objava žrtve vlomilca. Nepridiprav se je na roparski pohod podal malo pred 21. uro. Naredil je veliko škodo na oknih in vratih ter v notranjosti hiše premetal stvari.Lastnik mu sporoča: »Kljub maski na obrazu te bom dobil in ti bo precej bolj neprijetno, kot je zdaj meni.«Vlomilca, ki je imel čez obraz poveznjeno kapo (ali nekaj podobnega) z izrezi za oči in usta, je posnela kamera, video pa je javno objavljen na povezavi. Če osebo prepoznate, obvestite policijo.
text:
VIDEO: Eerie: When you watch a masked man in the video, he's hacking into your house
"Despite the mask on my face, I will get you and you will be much more uncomfortable than it is now."
02 Nov 2019, 09:59 by A.L.
PTUJ - The post of the victim of the burglar is circulating on social networks. Unexpectedly, he went on a robbery march shortly before 9pm. He did a lot of damage to the windows and doors and tossed things inside the house. or something similar) with cutouts for the eyes and mouth, the camera captured, and the video was posted publicly on the link. If you recognize the person, tell the police.
